did.unittitle: Women Faculty Forum, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of posters created during a campus-wide poster session "Scholarship by Women/Research on Gender," hosted by the Yale Women Faculty Forum, November 7-9, 2006.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 37 (YRG-37), Records of associations, institutes, centers, and organizations affiliated with Yale University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the Women Faculty Forum, 2007.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Women Faculty Forum, Yale University, Records (RU 1058). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by poster number.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Yale Women Faculty Forum (WFF) emerged from the effort, during Yale's tercentennial year, to highlight the presence of women at the university and the accomplishments of Yale alumnae. The WFF is supported by the offices of the president and provost and administered by the Council of the WFF. The WFF works in conjunction with alumni/alumnae and interested faculty and students to foster community for women at Yale and to deepen the understanding of the effects and implications of gender on all fields of thought.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of posters created during a campus-wide poster session "Scholarship by Women/Research on Gender," hosted by the Yale Women Faculty Forum, November 7-9, 2006.

controlaccess.subject: College teachers -- Societies, etc.
